participant_1.background:
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
i own a small farm where i herd cattle.
My husband and I love working with our hands and building things together.
My father died when I was young, but I grew up knowing my mother and my siblings.
my weekends are filled with bird watching.

participant_2.background:
I live in a small beach town where I can enjoy my morning mango and look out at the ocean.
i like chasing comodo lizards on a private island.
i am wiccan , but haven t told them.
my mother looks after my grandmother.
I took a vacation to visit my poppa and play with his train set.

content.text: Good so far! It's early still. Just enjoying my coffee and reading the news.
I love coffee! What's your favorite kind?
I love cold brew. My husband and I love to make things from scratch, so we try to make our own.
Wow, that's awesome! I'm not much of a coffee drinker, but my mom loves it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the beach. We live in a small beach town, so it's easy to get to.
That sounds lovely! I love the beach. I live on a farm, so I don't get to go as often as I would like to.
That's cool! I've always wanted to live on a farm. I love animals.
I do too! We have horses, cows, chickens, pigs, and a dog.
Wow, that's a lot of animals! I bet it's a lot of work to take care of them all.
It can be, but it's also a lot of fun! We love working with them.
I'm sure you do! I'm glad you enjoy your life. It sounds like you have a lot of fun.
Thanks! I do. I'm very lucky
